ContourJ

A Fiji plugin that provides a GUI for the active contours model (GVF/GGVF snakes)

⚠️ THIS IS A WORK IN PROGRESS. WE SUGGEST WAITING FOR A STABLE RELEASE BEFORE USE.

Installation

  1. Download the latest .jar file from the Releases page
  2. Copy the .jar file into your Fiji plugins folder (typically Fiji.app/plugins/)
  3. Restart Fiji

The plugin will appear in the Fiji menu after installation.

Note: Make sure you have Fiji installed before proceeding with the installation.
